page.title: 06Leisure in Woodham Ferrers 3
page.content: May Day Fair held in the Village Hall is a fund raising activity for many organisations who give a percentage of their profits to Hall funds. A school Fete is held at St Mary's Primary school in July for school funnds. Parents and children run stalls children participate in 5 a side football and country dancing display. Art and flower festival at St Mary the Virgin parish church invites local artists to display and sell their work. Flower arrangements are contributed by local individuals and groups and children exhibit art or craft work. Visitors are form all over the county for the three days of the fistival which also includes a concert by a local choir.
